full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL LDAN CHOS RJES GRUB MTHA' CHEN MO'I MCHAN 'GREL GYI SKABS SKABS SU MDZAD PA'I RTZA BA'I TSIG 'GREL ZUR DU BKOL BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @044B CES MCHAN 'GREL GYI MJUG TU SMRA BA'I TSIG 'GA' ZHIG GIS SMAD KYI CHA BRGYAN TE RDZOGS PAR BRIS PA 'DIS KYANG BSTAN 'GRO LA PHAN PA RGYA CHEN PO THOGS PAR GYUR CIG ,AOm SVA STI, ,THUB DBANG 'KHOR TSOGS BCAS LA GUS PAS 'DUD RDO RJES 'DZIN MDZOD, , @045A *, ,GRUB 'GREL CHEN MO'I GRUR ZHUGS RIN CHEN GLING SONG DED DPON MKHAS, ,GRUB PA'I GCES NOR GRU LA SPUNGS TE BSTAN PA'I GSOS SPYAD PA'I, ,SHAM DU GSAR SLOB DON DU RTZA TSIG BKROL BA'I YAR MTSUNGS THOR, , BDAG GIS BTUS BLUGS SPAR SNOD GCIG SBYAR KHU RE CHEN MOR BZHAG ,'DI GRUB DGE BAS GSAR SLOB GRVA PHRUG RTZA TSIG SA BON GYI, ,RO 'BRO'I RKYEN GYIS DE BSKRUN GRUB 'GREL MCHAN 'GREL DPAG BSAM GYI, ,YAL GA MTHOR 'DZEGS 'BRAS DPAL SPYOD LA RNAM DPYOD LUS BRTAS SHOG ,PAR YIG 'DRI DANG BAR SHING RKO BA DANG, ,RGYU SKYEN SBYAR SOGS 'DIR BRTZON LUS CAN RNAMS, ,GNAS SKABS MI 'DOD MTHA' DAG ZHI BA DANG, ,MTHAR THUG SKU BZHI'I DPAL LA MYUR SPYOD SHOG ,BLA MA DKON MCHOG GSUM GYI BYIN RLABS DANG, ,BSTAN BSRUNG DAM CAN RGYA MTSO'I MTHU STOBS DANG, ,LAS 'BRAS BSLU BA MED PA'I BDEN STOBS KYIS, ,BSAM DON YID BZHIN 'GRUB PA'I BKRA SHIS SHOG , ,, BSTAN PA YUN RING 'BAR GYUR CIG , ,,SHU BHA MASTU SARBA DZA GA T'A MA,, ,,
